branding.tagline: Touch the Stars, Understand Your Destiny

publishing_focus.primary_focus: Astrology books, zodiac-themed tarot decks, and celestial oracle cards.
publishing_focus.target_audience: Astrology lovers, tarot readers, spiritual seekers, and fans of the celestial.
publishing_focus.competitive_advantage: Our focus on high-quality, beautifully designed celestial and astrological materials set us apart from competitors. We provide the tools for people to understand and connect with the cosmos on a deeper level.
publishing_focus.example_titles: ‘Zodiac Oracle: Unveiling Your Celestial Blueprint’, ‘Star-Touched Tarot Deck’
